00015 /**
00016  * internal function to send kata debug info to the browser. just define your own function if you want firebug or something like it
00017  */
00018 if (!function_exists('kataDebugOutput')) {
00019     /**
00020      * @ignore
00021      * @param mixed $var variable to dump
00022      * @param bool $isTable if variable is an array we use a table to display each line
00023      */
00024     function kataDebugOutput($var = null, $isTable = false) {
00025         kataFunc :: debugOutput($var, $isTable);
00026     }
00027 }

00029 /**
00030  * create a directory in TMPPATH and check if its writable
00031  */
00032 function kataMakeTmpPath($dirname) {
00033     if (!file_exists(KATATMP . $dirname . DS)) {
00034         if (!mkdir(KATATMP . $dirname, 0770, true)) {
00035             throw new Exception("makeTmpPath: cant create temporary path $dirname");
00036         }
00037     }
00038     if (!is_writable(KATATMP . $dirname)) {
00039         throw new Exception("makeTmpPath: " . KATATMP . "$dirname is not writeable");
00040     }
00041 }

00043 /**
00044  * static wrapper class so dont we pollute any namespace anymore
00045  */
00046 class kataFunc {

00048     /**
00049      * return the shortend path of the file currently begin executed
00050      * 
00051      * @return string
00052      */
00053     function getLineInfo() {
00054         return;
00055         $nestLevel = -1;
00056         $bt = debug_backtrace();
00057         while ($nestLevel++ < count($bt)) {
00058             if (empty ($bt[$nestLevel]['file']))
00059                 continue;
00060             foreach (array (
00061                     LIB,
00062                     ROOT . 'utilities' . DS
00063                 ) as $test) {
00064                 if (substr($bt[$nestLevel]['file'], 0, strlen($test)) == $test)
00065                     continue 2;
00066             }
00067             break;
00068         }
00069         return basename($bt[$nestLevel]['file']) . ':' . $bt[$nestLevel]['line'];
00070     }
00071 
00072     /**
00073      * return stacktrace-like information about the given variable
00074      * 
00075      * @return string
00076      */
00077     function getValueInfo($val) {
00078         if (is_null($val)) {
00079             return 'null';
00080         }
00081         if (is_array($val)) {
00082             return 'array[' . count($val) . ']';
00083         }
00084         if (is_bool($val)) {
00085             return ($val ? 'true' : 'false');
00086         }
00087         if (is_float($val) || is_int($val) || is_long($val) || is_real($val)) {
00088             return 'num:' . $val;
00089         }
00090         if (is_string($val)) {
00091             return 'string[' . strlen($val) . ']=' . substr($val, 0, 16);
00092         }
00093         if (is_resource($val)) {
00094             return 'resource' . get_resource_type($val);
00095         }
00096         if (is_object($val)) {
00097             return 'object';
00098         }
00099         return '?';
00100     }
00101 
00102     /**
00103      * include files depending on name, if class is needed 
00104      *
00105      * @param string $cname classname
00106      */
00107     static function autoloader($classname) {
00108         $cname = strtolower($classname);
00109         switch ($cname) {
00110             case 'appmodel' :
00111                 if (file_exists(ROOT . 'models' . DS . 'app_model.php')) {
00112                     require ROOT . 'models' . DS . 'app_model.php';
00113                 } else {
00114                     require LIB . 'models' . DS . 'app_model.php';
00115                 }
00116                 break;
00117 
00118             case 'appcontroller' :
00119                 if (file_exists(ROOT . 'controllers' . DS . 'app_controller.php')) {
00120                     require ROOT . 'controllers' . DS . 'app_controller.php';
00121                 } else {
00122                     require LIB . 'controllers' . DS . 'app_controller.php';
00123                 }
00124                 break;
00125 
00126                 /*** GF_SPECIFIC ***/
00127             case substr($classname, 0, 3) == 'GF_' or substr($classname, 0, 5) == 'Zend_' or substr($classname, 0, 6) == 'ZendX_' :
00128                 require str_replace('_', '/', $classname) . '.php';
00129                 break;
00130                 /*** /GF_SPECIFIC ***/
00131 
00132             case substr($cname, -9, 9) == 'component' :
00133                 $cname = substr($cname, 0, -9);
00134                 if (file_exists(LIB . 'controllers' . DS . 'components' . DS . $cname . '.php')) {
00135                     require LIB . 'controllers' . DS . 'components' . DS . $cname . '.php';
00136                     break;
00137                 }
00138                 require ROOT . 'controllers' . DS . 'components' . DS . $cname . '.php';
00139                 break;
00140 
00141             case substr($cname, -6, 6) == 'helper' :
00142                 $cname = substr($cname, 0, -6);
00143                 if (file_exists(LIB . 'views' . DS . 'helpers' . DS . $cname . '.php')) {
00144                     require LIB . 'views' . DS . 'helpers' . DS . $cname . '.php';
00145                     break;
00146                 }
00147                 require ROOT . 'views' . DS . 'helpers' . DS . $cname . '.php';
00148                 break;
00149 
00150             case substr($cname, -7, 7) == 'utility' :
00151                 if (file_exists(LIB . 'utilities' . DS . $cname . '.php')) {
00152                     require LIB . 'utilities' . DS . $cname . '.php';
00153                     break;
00154                 }
00155                 require ROOT . 'utilities' . DS . $cname . '.php';
00156                 break;
00157 
00158             case file_exists(LIB . $cname . '.php') :
00159                 require LIB . $cname . '.php';
00160                 break;
00161 
00162             case 'scaffoldcontroller' :
00163                 require LIB . 'controllers' . DS . 'scaffold_controller.php';
00164                 break;
00165 
00166         }
00167     }
00168 
00169     /**
00170      * the default debug output function. outputs print_r alike dump
00171      * @param mixed $var variables to output
00172      * @param bool $isTable if true variables are output in a table
00173      */
00174     static function debugOutput($var = null, $isTable = false) {
00175         if (DEBUG < 2) {
00176             return;
00177         }
00178         if ($isTable) {
00179             echo '<table style="text-align:left;direction:ltr;border:1px solid red;color:black;background-color:#e8e8e8;border-collapse:collapse;text-align:left;direction:ltr;">';
00180             foreach ($var as $row) {
00181                 echo '<tr>';
00182                 foreach ($row as $col) {
00183                     echo '<td style="border:1px solid red;padding:2px;">' . $col . '</td>';
00184                 }
00185                 echo '</tr>';
00186             }
00187             echo '</table>';
00188         } else {
00189             echo '<pre style="white-space:pre-wrap;text-align:left;direction:ltr;border:1px solid red;color:black;background-color:#e8e8e8;padding:3px;text-align:left;direction:ltr;">' . $var . '</pre>';
00190         }
00191     }

00193     /**
00194      * shorthand function to read from serveral code caches
00195      * @param string $id key to fetch
00196      * @return bool success
00197      */
00198     static function memoryRead($id) {
00199         if (function_exists('apc_fetch')) {
00200             return apc_fetch($id);
00201         }
00202         if (function_exists('eaccelerator_get')) {
00203             //eacc? bloody hell...
00204             $data = eaccelerator_get($id);
00205             if($data!==null) {
00206                 $data = @unserialize($data); 
00207             }
00208             return $data;
00209         }
00210         if (function_exists('xcache_get')) {
00211             return xcache_get($id);
00212         }
00213         return false;
00214     }
00215 
00216     /**
00217      * shorthand function to read from serveral code caches
00218      * @param string $id key to fetch
00219      * @param mixed $value value(s) to store. if FALSE key will be wiped from memory
00220      * @return bool success
00221      */
00222     static function memoryWrite($id, $value) {
00223         if (false !== $value) {
00224             if (function_exists('apc_store')) {
00225                 return apc_store($id, $value,300);
00226             }
00227             if (function_exists('eaccelerator_put')) {
00228                 return eaccelerator_put($id, serialize($value), 300);
00229             }
00230             if (function_exists('xcache_set')) {
00231                 return xcache_set($id, $value, 300);
00232             }
00233             return false;
00234         }
00235         //yes, i'm checking for the wrong function
00236         if (function_exists('apc_store')) {
00237             return apc_delete($id);
00238         }
00239         if (function_exists('eaccelerator_put')) {
00240             return eaccelerator_rm($id);
00241         }
00242         if (function_exists('xcache_set')) {
00243             return xcache_unset($id);
00244         }
00245         return false;
00246     }
00247
